answers.answer: HiWe are not doctors, here.  however, from your results it looks like you have improved your diet and probably increased your exercise. Am I correct?Are you on medications?  if you are not, medication such as metformin may be something you ask your doctor about.Your blood sugar levels are still above normal (normal hba1c is < 5.0, though most doctors will consider < 5.7 is non-diabetic), but have improved.Keep up your efforts.  Exercise, weight management.  Look into low carb eating (ie. Paleo style, mediteranean - without the bread, pasta and potatoes, new atkins etc).

question: Good morning Mrs. Thank you very much for helping the people out there I have one question ifyou don’t mind helping me out. I am a 28 years old single manI don’t drink and smoke at all never in all my life (Muslim) – I don’t do any exerciseI was diagnose with type 2 diabetes on the 7th of April 2016and they say that I have a 6.8 HbA1C and I am 175 Cm tall and I weight 108 back in Aprilnow my weight in 11-08-2016 is 103my result before and now are like this:Test	                           My Result April 07	My Result August 11HbA1C	                            6.8	                               6.2Glucose Fasting	             7.2	                                6.6Alanine Aminotransferase	100	                                   -Albumin	                                 46	                                     -Alkaline Phosphatase	        100                                  	-Aspartate Aminotransferase	  52	                                      -Bilirubin Total	                           6                                    	-Protein total	                          75	                                       -Cholesterol Total                      	6.6	                            5.9Cholesterol HDL	                    1.28	                           1.36Cholesterol LDL	                       4.1	                             3.7Cholesterol VLDL                     	1.2	                              0.9Non HDL-C	                                 5.3	                              4.5Triglycerides	                                  2.7	                               1.9So Guys what do you think is my result is OK or not
title: Asking about is my health report is OK?
